extensionDescription.message: Search results link directly to the source rather than to Bing video player.

contextMenuHeading.description: Heading for the 'context menu' ('right-click') section of the options page.

enableContextMenu.description: Label for the checkbox that enables the context menu.

bingVideoSearchUrl.description: The url for bing video search when the user searches for $QUERY$.

searchBingVideo.description: Text for the 'search Bing Video' context menu. The %s is a placeholder for the highlighted text on the page.

contactHeading.description: Heading for the 'contact developer' section of the options page.

contactInstructions.message: Please report bugs and submit feedback to bing.video.helper@gmail.com

donate.description: Label for the button that allows the user to donate money. The two dollar signs $$ is not a typo. It is necessary so that chrome.i18n.getMessage() interprets it as the string '$1' rather than the variable $1.
